title: Ep 131: Soko Mascara
itunes:title: Ep 131: Soko Mascara
itunes:subtitle: Charlotte Cho, an aesthetician and the founder of Soko Glam, plays co-host this week. She and Jenn discuss the origins of K-beauty, double-cleansing, skip care, humidifiers, why houseplants help your skin, ASMR, and sooo much else. Pl...
description:
Charlotte Cho, an aesthetician and the founder of Soko Glam, plays co-host this week. She and Jenn discuss the origins of K-beauty, double-cleansing, skip care, humidifiers, why houseplants help your skin, ASMR, and sooo much else. Plus: @esteelaundry is the beauty version of @diet_prada, but who’s behind the account?



Want more Fat Mascara? 

Our secret Facebook group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand 

Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit 

Twitter: @fatmascara 

Email: info@fatmascara.com

Website: fatmascara.com

Discounts from the pod: Follain.com/mascara enter promo code mascara for free shipping and the clean essentials kit for $22; takecareof.com and enter code mascara for 25% off your first month; awayluggage.com/mascara and enter promo code mascara for $20 off a suitcase; Freshbasket.com enter code mascara for $20 off your first three orders  

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
